## RemirrorThemeContextType.sx() method

This is similar to the css method but an array of themed objects which have all the `@styled-system/css` props available. All objects will be themed

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sx(...args: Array<RemirrorInterpolation | RemirrorInterpolation[]>): (props?: RemirrorTheme | {
        theme: RemirrorTheme;
    }) => SerializedStyles;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  args | <code>Array&lt;RemirrorInterpolation &#124; RemirrorInterpolation[]&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`(props?: RemirrorTheme | {
        theme: RemirrorTheme;
    }) => SerializedStyles`
